title: Art of the western world
creator_contributor_role: WNET (Television station : New York, N.Y.), production company
description: Traces the history of art from the ancient Greek classical style, to the modern era. Focuses on painting, sculpture and architecture, highlighting the critical works and achievements of the artists of each period. Michael Wood narrates, and renowned art historians give their insight into the history of art.
